name: Empower through Play
description:
Created by undergraduate mentors of SLAM at UCF, this Twine game puts the player in a variety of leadership scenarios and allows you to hone your leadership style.

 How to play:

It is recommended to play this game in fullscreen mode. Click the button in the bottom right corner of the game window to enable fullscreen mode. Use your mouse to click on the image of the companion you want to start the game. Then, use your mouse to click on choices throughout the game.

Credits:

Character portraits by slimosine

Game developed by Amy Schwinge
